com.sshtools.ssh.components

Class SshKeyExchangeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sshtools.ssh.components.SshKeyExchangeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SshKeyExchange
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiffieHellmanGroup14Sha1, DiffieHellmanGroup1Sha1, DiffieHellmanGroupExchangeSha1

    public abstract class SshKeyExchangeClient
extends Object
implements SshKeyExchange

    Abstract representation of an SSH key exchange.

    Author:
    Lee David Painter
